name: Barovia
text: Defending champion can cast wizard spells and can discard one enemy ally each round.

name: Darkon
text: In a victorious defense, a maximum of one ally remains with the realm card and becomes undead.

name: Kartakass
text: Werebeast champions and allies cannot attack this realm.

name: Keening
text: Each round Keening is attacked, one living enemy ally is discarded.

name: Tepest
text: If razed in combat, look at top six cards of opponent's deck. Place one at the bottom of his draw pile.

name: Vebrek
text: Wolves are a +3 ally to defending champions.

name: Invidia
text: If razed in combat, draw two cards at random from attacker's hand and discard them.

name: Dementlieu
text: Defender can change the attacking champion to any other champion in the attacker's pool.

name: Valachan
text: Can defend itself as a level 5 undead champion (vampire).

name: Har' Akir
text: Cleric spells lose 2 levels when attacking Har' Akir.

name: Sri Raji
text: Only champions with an unmodified level of 6 or higher can attack this realm.

name: Castle Ravenloft
text: The attached realm and its defenders are immune to all offensive spells.

name: Azalin's Graveyard
text: Can call upon a +6 zombie horde as an ally to defend the attached realm for one round per battle.

name: Kargat Mausoleum
text: The attached realm can defend itself as a level 4 undead champion (vampire).

name: Paridon
text: If the attached realm is attacked, a doppleganger imitates any one of the attacker's allies each round.

name: Pharaoh's Rest
text: The power of the ancients subtracts 3 levels from champions attacking the attached realm.

name: Mists
text: All players can rearrange their realms and holdings.

name: Dark Powers
text: All players shuffle their discard piles and place on top of their decks.

name: Grand Conjunction
text: All champions can attack any realm, regardless of its position, until the end of this player's next turn.

name: Harvest Moon
text: Double the level of all werebeasts and undead until the end of this player's next turn.

name: All Hollow's Eve
text: All monster champions gain 3 levels until the end of this player's next turn.

name: Quirk of Fate
text: All champions use the first digit of their card number for their level until the end of this player's next turn.

name: Disrupted Magic
text: Champions that can cast wizard spells now can cast only cleric spells and vice versa, until the end of this player's next turn.

name: Power of the Land
text: All champions gain 1 level for each Ravenloft realm and holding in their player's control until the end of this player's next turn.

name: Spell Book of Drawmij
text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Victorious Greyhawk champions may keep one spell used that round that they can cast normally when they return to the pool. The spell is automatically cast again the next time that champion fights. Any dispel magic card can be used to remove the spell.

name: City States
text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. One Dark Sun holding can be counted as a realm for the purpose of victory conditions.

name: Islands of Terror
text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Play Ravenloft realms face down, but vertically. (Holdings are still face up, as are other realms.) Reveal the realm only when it is attacked. If one of his Ravenloft realms is razed, the player can rearrange all his Ravenloft realms.

name: Eyes of the Undead
text: If an opponent has an undead champion or ally, player can look at the opponent's hand. (Def/4)

name: Living Ward
text: All of the opponent's living allies (not undead) in play are discarded. (Off/4)

name: Binding Curse
text: If defeated, this champion can curse its opponent to lose 3 levels until a dispel magic removes this card. (Off/4)

name: Conjure Grave Elemental
text: Casting this spell creates a +8 ally for the duration of the round. (Off/4)

name: Animate Rock
text: (Off/4)

name: Word of Recall
text: Pick one opposing ally card and discard it. (Off/4)

name: Glyph of Warding
text: All opposing allies lose 1 level. (Off/4)

name: Call Lightning
text: (Off/4)

name: Prayer
text: This champion's allies all gain 2 levels. (Def/4)

name: Turn Undead
text: All undead enemy allies with levels equal to or less than the champion must be discarded. (Off/4)

name: Imbue with Spell Ability
text: A cleric in a player's pool can cast this on any champion, allowing him to cast cleric spells for this round. (Def/3)

name: Insect Plague
text: (Off/4)

name: Plane Shift
text: Player can substitute any unrazed realm's power, but not its attached holding, for this round. (Off/4)

name: Heal
text: Player may retrieve any champion or ally from his discard pile and return to his hand. (Def/3)

name: Shadow Magic
text: (Off/4)

name: Shades
text: Casting this spell creates a +4 ally. (Def/4)

name: Vampiric Touch
text: Has no effect on undead champions. (Off/4)

name: Hold Person
text: Reduces opposing champion's level to 0 for this round. (Off/4)

name: Detect Magic
text: Opponent lays all spells and magical items in his hand face up on the table for this round. (Off/4)

name: Augment Undead
text: Undead champions and allies gain 2 levels for this round. (Def/4)

name: Strahd's Malefic Meld
text: Multiply the levels of the two weakest allies and add to the total. If only one ally is present, it is now a 0. (Def/4)

name: Misty Summons
text: From any pool, use a champion (level only) not immune to spells as an ally. Win or lose, champion is returned to its pool. (Def/4)

name: Neverending Nightmare
text: Player adds 1 level to this champion for each realm and holding he has in play. (Def/4)

name: Chill Touch
text: Does not affect undead monsters. (Off/4)

name: Tarokka Deck
text: When used in battle, the player may look at the top six cards of his opponent's deck and discard one. (Def)

name: Timepiece of Klorr
text: If victorious, this champion may make one extra attack on the same realm before being put in his pool. (Def)

name: Ring of Regeneration
text: If this champion is defeated, he is returned to his pool at the end of the player's next turn. (Def)

name: Sun Sword
text: The sword becomes +5 if the opposing champion is undead. (Off)

name: Blood Coin
text: If defeated, put card on opponent's champion. Opponent's hand size is reduced by one until dispel magic is cast or the new owner is defeated. (Off)

name: Staff of Mimicry
text: Imitates one magical item attached to any other champion in this player's pool. (Def)

name: Soul Searcher Medallion
text: Before combat, the player can look at one other player's hand. If used, the attached champion cannot attack this turn. (Def)

name: Ring of Reversion
text: The opposing champion cannot use his power or cast spells. (Off)

name: Amulet of the Beast
text: Used in combat, one enemy ally (except undead) is turned into a werebeast, causing him to switch sides. (Off)

name: Cat of Felkovic
text: If victorious, champion keeps up to six ally cards face down with it. These are dead allies; however, champion gains 1 level for each card. (Off)

name: Apparatus
text: Player borrows any champion (level only) from any pool as an ally. Win or lose, champion is returned to its pool.

name: Crown of Souls
text: When used to attack, defender's realm power (but not attached holding) is ignored.

name: Holy Symbol of Ravenkind
text: Opponent cannot use undead champions or allies. OR card can be discarded to force Strahd to be discarded permanently.

name: Tapestry of Dark Souls
text: When used in combat, opponent can have only one ally. Any extras are discarded.

name: Fang of the Nosferatu
text: Attached champion can substitute the powers of any champion from any pool other than its own.

name: Kargat Vampire
text: Flyer. Undead. Becomes +7 if defending a realm with a mausoleum or graveyard holding.

name: Flesh Golem
text: Rips magical items from its opponent, who must discard all attached magical items.

name: Ghost Ship
text: Champion and allies become flyers. When attacking, can switch attack to a different realm.

name: Strahd Zombies
text: Undead.

name: Fiend
text: Flyer. Opposing clerics lose 3 levels against this ally.

name: Spectre
text: Flyer. Undead. All enemy champions and allies (except undead) lose 1 level when opposing this ally.

name: Vistani
text: If opposing champion is victorious, he loses his power until dispel magic is cast on him. Keep this card with the champion.

name: Loup-Garou
text: Werebeast. Opposing champion is automatically defeated unless he has or can play a magical item.

name: Werebat
text: Flyer. Werebeast.

name: Mysterious Stranger
text: One card from this player's hand is kept hidden under this one. Use it in his next battle, then hide a new card.

name: Azalin
text: Undead. Casts wizard spells. If victorious in battle, takes one ally with him into the pool.

name: Adam
text: Immune to all offensive spells and magical items.

name: Ankhtepot
text: Undead. Casts cleric spells. Ignores the effects of opposing holdings.

name: Ireena Kolyana
text: Level 5 vs. undead. If facing Strahd, he returns to his pool; that player must select another champion or lose the battle.

name: Dr. Rudolph Van Richten
text: Opponent must lay his hand face up for this round. Level 6 vs. any Ravenloft champion.

name: Harkon Lukas
text: Werebeast. When in combat, he picks one magical item, artifact, spell, or ally of the opponent to be discarded.

name: Headless Horseman
text: Flyer. If attacking, it can choose to automatically win the round, but card must then be discarded.

name: Arijani
text: When attacking, picks which champion from his opponent's pool will face him.

name: Wilfred Godefroy
text: Undead. Flyer. Any undead allies gain 2 levels.

name: Tiyet
text: Undead. Casts cleric spells.

name: Sir Hiregaard
text: When defending, he turns into a level 6 monster.

name: Gabrielle Aderre
text: If defeated, looks at opponent's hand and places one card on the bottom of that player's draw pile.

name: Hags of Tepest
text: Cast wizard spells. When in combat, player can take one wizard spell from his deck and play it. Reshuffle the deck.

name: Sir Edmund Bloodsworth
text: Doppleganger. Imitates the level or power of his opponent, but not both. Uses power second (after opponent).

name: High Master Illithid
text: Can look at opponent's hand after declaring which realm he is attacking.

name: Dr. Mordenheim
text: Can use one ally card from his discard deck.

name: Sergei Von Zarovich
text: Undead. Sergei is immune to all event cards, even beneficial ones.

name: Lord Soth
text: Immune to offensive wizard spells. Opposing Dragonlance champions cannot use their powers.

name: Strahd Von Zarovich
text: Flyer. Undead. Casts wizard spells. If defeated in combat and no other Strahd is in play, he returns to his pool at the end of player's next turn.
